AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be read automatically (type yes to activate or no to deactivate; don't write in capital letters)

AUTO_DOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be downloaded automatically and sent to you (type yes to activate or no to deactivate; don't write in capital letters)

PM_PERMIT.description: Other users can't use your bot in private messages (type yes to activate or no to deactivate; don't write in capital letters)

BOT_NAME.description: put a name for your bot

BOT_MENU_LINKS.description: add one or many links for your bot menu; e.g., url1,url2,url3.....

PUBLIC_MODE.description: type yes to put your bot in public mode or no to put it in private mode

HEROKU_APY_KEY.description: insert your Heroku API key (this is optional)

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: insert your Heroku APP NAME (this is optional)

SESSION_ID.description: put your session ID, the code you receive after scanning the QR code

NUMERO_OWNER.description: Your number, don't put '+' and include your area code (example for Togo '228')

WARN_COUNT.description: this is the limit of warnings for warning commands

STARTING_BOT_MESSAGE.description: if you don't want a starting-bot-message put no, otherwise put yes

PRESENCE.description: Mark your presence: 1 to indicate that you are online even if you are not. 2 to indicate that you are currently typing a message. 3 to indicate that you are currently recording an audio. Or leave the field blank to indicate your real state.

PM_CHATBOT.description: Put yes if you want the bot to automatically respond to messages in private

ANTI_VIEW_ONCE.description: Put yes if you want to receive all view once content in private messages

ANTI_COMMAND_SPAM.description: activate a cooldown of 10 seconds for every user after a command to avoid spamming unless owner and mods

ANTI_DELETE_MESSAGE.description: Put yes if you want messages deleted by other users to be sent to you in private messages

AUTO_REACT_MESSAGE.description: Put yes if you want messages to be automatically reacted to
